effect.sun_moon: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.

short_effect.sun_moon: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
